TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebApplicationLifetimeEvent extends System.Web.Management.WebManagementEvent

summary.span: 表示应用程序的生存期中重要的事件。

span.span: Represents a significant event in the lifetime of an application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 运行状况监视，可以管理已部署的 Web 应用程序的生产和操作人员。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空间包含负责打包应用程序运行状况状态数据和负责处理此数据提供程序类型的运行状况事件类型。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它还包含有助于管理运行状况事件的支持类型。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 应用程序生存期事件包括事件，例如应用程序启动和关闭事件。Application lifetime events include events such as application startup and shutdown events. 如果应用程序将被终止，可以通过查看相关的事件消息字段来确定原因。If an application is terminated, you can determine why by viewing the related event message field. 当实例发生，ASP.NET 运行状况监视更新应用程序生存期事件性能计数器。When a instance occurs, ASP.NET health monitoring updates the Application Lifetime Events performance counter. 可以通过添加记录这些事件对象传递给`rules`子节`healthMonitoring`配置文件，如下面的示例中所示的部分。You can log these events by adding the object to the `rules` subsection of the `healthMonitoring` section of the configuration file, as shown in the following example. ``` ``` 应用程序生存期事件性能计数器包含所有 ASP.NET 生存期事件的总和。The Application Lifetime Events performance counter contains the sum total of all ASP.NET lifetime events. 若要查看此性能计数器在系统监视器 (PerfMon) 中**添加计数器**窗口中选择**ASP.NET**从**性能对象**下拉列表。To view this performance counter in System Monitor (PerfMon), in the **Add Counters** window select **ASP.NET** from the **Performance object** drop-down list. 选择**应用程序生存期事件**性能计数器，然后单击**添加**按钮。Select the **Application Lifetime Events** performance counter, and click the **Add** button. 有关详细信息，请参阅上的"使用系统监视器 (PerfMon) 与 ASP.NET 应用程序" [MSDN](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118)。For more information, see "Using the System Monitor (PerfMon) with ASP.NET Applications" on [MSDN](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118). 如果允许以标准的记录的事件，通过选择可以查看事件查看器中它们**应用程序**日志。If you allow events to be logged by the standard , you can view them in Event Viewer by selecting the **Application** log. 有关详细信息，请参阅[事件查看器](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=24845&clcid=0x409)在 TechNet 上的 Windows Server 2003 文档。For more information, see [Event Viewer](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=24845&clcid=0x409) in the Windows Server 2003 documentation on TechNet. > [!CAUTION] > 因为对象是大量事件，日志记录它是资源密集型的和可能会减慢你的系统。Because the object is a high-volume event, logging it is resource-intensive and might slow down your system. 它还可能会导致其他事件的情况下覆盖因为数量过多事件和方法的类事件日志记录的工作原理。It can also cause other events to be overwritten in the case of the class due to the high volume of events and the way the event logging works. > [!NOTE] > 在大多数情况下你将能够实现时，使用 ASP.NET 运行状况监视类型，你将通过指定中的值来控制运行状况监视系统`healthMonitoring`配置节。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 您还可以从要创建你自己的自定义事件和提供程序的运行状况监视类型派生。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 有关示例的派生自类，请参阅本主题中提供的示例。For an example of deriving from the class, see the example provided in this topic. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从派生类，以创建自定义事件。The following code example shows how to derive from the class to create a custom event. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent/CS/webapplicationlifetimeevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent/VB/webapplicationlifetimeevent.vb#1)] 下面的配置文件摘录显示了如何配置`healthMonitoring`部分中的配置文件以添加`SampleWebApplicationLifetimeEvent`ASP.NET 运行状况监视系统到上面定义的代码。The following configuration-file excerpt shows how to configure the `healthMonitoring` section of a configuration file to add the `SampleWebApplicationLifetimeEvent` code defined above to the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. 若要将事件添加到系统，必须定义该事件由添加到新的入口`eventMappings`部分，并将事件映射到提供程序，通过添加到新的入口`rules`部分。To add the event to the system, you must define the event by adding a new entry to the `eventMappings` section and map the event to a provider by adding a new entry to the `rules` section. ``` // Configure the connection between the // application lifetime event object // and the provider that must process it. ```

span.para: 格式设置为显示你自定义事件的信息，当重写方法而不是方法。这将避免覆盖或篡改敏感的系统信息。
When formatting your custom event information for display, override the method rather than the method. This will avoid overwriting or tampering with sensitive system information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 运行状况监视系统在内部使用此构造函数。This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. 您不应使用它来创建的实例类，但可以实现自己从此类继承的事件类型时，可以调用此构造函数。You will never use it to create an instance of the class, but you can call this constructor when implementing your own event type that inherits from this class. > [!NOTE] > 构造函数不应在代码中直接使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它是由 ASP.NET 调用。It is called by ASP.NET. 您可以调用构造函数从派生时类。You can call the constructor when deriving from the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用ASP.NET 自定义运行状况事件中。The following code example shows how to use the in an ASP.NET custom health event. 此代码示例主要用于显示要使用的正确语法。This code example is mainly intended to show the correct syntax to use. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent/CS/webapplicationlifetimeevent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent/VB/webapplicationlifetimeevent.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 运行状况监视系统在内部使用此构造函数。This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. 您不应使用它来创建的实例类，但可以实现自己从此类继承的事件类型时，可以调用此构造函数。You will never use it to create an instance of the class, but you can call this constructor when implementing your own event type that inherits from this class. > [!NOTE] > 构造函数不应在代码中直接使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它是由 ASP.NET 调用。It is called by ASP.NET. 您可以调用构造函数从派生时类。You can call the constructor when deriving from the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用ASP.NET 自定义运行状况事件中。The following code example shows how to use the in an ASP.NET custom health event. 此代码示例主要用于显示要使用的正确语法。This code example is mainly intended to show the correct syntax to use. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent/CS/webapplicationlifetimeevent.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/system.web.management.WebApplicationLifetimeEvent/VB/webapplicationlifetimeevent.vb#3)]
